rows.label: qst650331_msg0002
rows.name:
Friends know how hard it is to track
down world-traveling adventurers?

rows.label: qst650331_msg0003
rows.name:
Sorinosori is seasoned veteran
courier, but find friends take every
ounce of resolve and determination.

rows.label: qst650331_msg0004
rows.name:
Eventually, Sorinosori decide to
wait for adventurers to come to
Sorinosori.

rows.label: qst650331_msg0005
rows.name:
It unconventional delivery technique
but seems to be pay off. Oh! Package.
This is for friends from Iyasaki Village.

rows.label: qst650331_msg0006
rows.name:
Is from Correl, but she got from kid
named Kazuna.

rows.label: qst650331_msg0007
rows.name: Kazuna got from kid named Martis.

rows.label: qst650331_msg0009
rows.name:
...Anyway, it very valuable Core Crystal,
so everybody say to Sorinosori "Please
to not drop or break".

rows.label: qst650331_msg0010
rows.name:
Villagers find it in dusty box in attic,
and decide must entrust to people
who use it in good way.

rows.label: qst650331_msg0011
rows.name:
That why they give to Sorinosori.
Sorinosori just have trustworthy face,
me guess.

rows.label: qst650331_msg0012
rows.name: And now Sorinosori entrust to you.

rows.label: qst650331_msg0013
rows.name:
It very valuable, hence innovative new
courier style of Sorinosori involving no
movement and no risk of lose or break.

rows.label: qst650331_msg0015
rows.name:
Such out-of-box thinking is proof that
Sorinosori leveled up as courier.

rows.label: qst650331_msg0016
rows.name:
Maybe brother Hurryscurry interested
in learnings of Sorinosori...

rows.label: qst650331_msg0017
rows.name:
Please not to forget rate at least
four and half stars!
